name: CPM TELECOM
overview:
CPM TELECOM is a cutting-edge enterprise in the field of mobile services, which offers to operators and other firms a new way of generating communication models with its users. It is a company consisted of a young and innovative team with renowned professionals with experience in added value business.
CPM has created a new service for network operators and agencies: PUBLITONO, the unique Permission Ring Back Tone Advertising service.

Why?:

More than 10% of the time we spend on the mobile is wasted on listening to boring ring tones. This means to be more than 3 hours a year on hold listening to the tone, without doing anything worth it. And it is, further, boring!

Objetive:

To insert interesting and well-done advertising with true offers and promotions in that waiting time.

Result:

Who phones gets discounts and offers by listening to advertising. The network operator has better results without investing and the advertiser gains efficiency and obtains real measurable results

How?:

The PGP platform (hardware and software) emits and manages the advertising developed by CPM
